quote: so that anyone who is opposed may be put to shame
to those who are stained and unbelieving, nothing is pure
to redeem us from all lawlessness
poured the Holy Spirit on us
we might become heirs through the confidence of eternal life
has turned from the right way
so that they may not be unfruitful
the grace of God has appeared ... trains us
led astray ... by various passions and pleasures
when the kindness of God our savior and his love for mankind appeared
